last_episode_to_air.name: Sister Staycation
last_episode_to_air.overview: Toni’s latest single drops just in time for her birthday; the sisters and Ms. E are quarantining with surprises at the house; Towanda takes care of the last hurdle preventing Sean from popping the question.

name: Braxton Family Values
overview: Like their famous sister Toni Braxton, Traci, Towanda, Trina and Tamar were all blessed with the gift of song and shared that gift as a group called "The Braxtons," managed by their mom Evelyn. Now, after battling debilitating illnesses that left her out of the spotlight, Toni Braxton is now fighting her way back to the top. She enlists the help of her sisters, but the drama they bring proves to be too much at times.

episodes.name: The Bermuda Triangle
episodes.overview: Ready to relaunch her singing career, R&B superstar Toni invites her four younger sisters to join her for a benefit concert in Bermuda. But old rivalries and resentments threaten to ruin what was meant to be a joyful family reunion.

episodes.name: Taste Of A Wedding Singer
episodes.overview: The Braxton sisters fear that Trina’s weight gain and alcohol abuse are symptoms of a depression. They consult a family therapist, then surprise Trina with an intervention. After a rocky start, progress is made, and the sisters hold hands at the end.

episodes.name: It’s My Birthday
episodes.overview: Toni’s plans for a quiet birthday are ruined when Tamar convinces her that the sisters should jet to Miami to celebrate. They take a yacht tour, attend a Dolphins game, and shop for a vacation home. Back in Atlanta, Towanda sets Toni up on a date.

episodes.name: I Love LA
episodes.overview: Toni, her mother, and her sisters arrive at Tamar and Vince’s house in Los Angeles, where they’ll be staying while Toni is honored at a Lupus LA charity event. Tamar gives them an annoyingly detailed list of her “house rules” that she expects them to follow, as well as a “to-do” list of activities.

episodes.name: From Russia with Love
episodes.overview: Toni meets with Vince to discuss her upcoming gig in Russia, and the state of her career. She wants to do a Vegas show, but she’s concerned no one will hire her because of her Lupus. Vince reassures her. Traci is upset when she learns that she can’t go to Russia due to a visa issue.

episodes.name: Getting the Band Back Together
episodes.overview: Vince meets with Toni’s sisters and proposes doing a family album. He’s not sure if Toni will be involved or not. Tamar is the only one who has reservations, since she wants to do her own album, and won’t do it without Toni. Towanda and Andre argue as they move into Toni’s house.

episodes.name: Dog of a Birthday Party
episodes.overview: Toni Braxton is a six time Grammy award winning performer who has sold over forty million records worldwide, starred in two Broadway plays and headlined her own show at the Flamingo in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: To Play or Not to Playboy
episodes.overview: The sisters hang out at Toni’s house when Tamar shows up and pulls out a selection of adult magazines to try to discourage Toni from posing in Playboy. Toni finds this ridiculous since Playboy is way classier than these other rags, but the sisters have fun checking out the photos.

episodes.name: You Can’t Go Home Again
episodes.overview: Trina visits Dr. Sherry for some guidance about her marriage and her alcoholism. She asks Trina to give up alcohol for 90 days.

episodes.name: Guess Who’s Coming to Dinner
episodes.overview: The girls’ father attends a family dinner causing a huge blow up with their mom. Towanda delivers separation papers to her husband.  Traci commits to moving to Atlanta but Toni decides she is moving to LA jeopardizing the Braxton album.

episodes.name: Braxton Family Reunion
episodes.overview: Nationally syndicated talk show host Wendy Williams dishes with the girls – Toni, Traci, Towanda, Trina and Tamar – and gets the real scoop on:  if Toni ever made the move to L.A.; how Trina felt about losing her wig-cap during her DUI arrest and where she and Gabe stand today.

episodes.name: R.E.S.P.E.C.T
episodes.overview: First they’re bickering, then they’re booty shaking – Trina, Towanda, Traci, Toni and Tamar are back. When Evelyn and Traci visit Toni in LA, tensions flare due to Tamar’s newfound fame. Trina’s marriage is put to the test thanks to her new houseguests, and Toni admits she’s been seeing her ex.

episodes.name: Beauty School Drop-Out
episodes.overview: Unhappy with the producer Vince has chosen for her, Tamar goes behind his back to meet with someone else. Traci considers opening a salon and Towanda attempts to whip Toni’s new assistant into shape.

episodes.name: A Snooping Dog
episodes.overview: Gabe and Trina fight over the GPS he installed in her phone while Tamar flies to Chicago to be a guest D.J. After talking to Towanda about their relationship, Andre’s inspired to write a book.

episodes.name: New Doo-Whop Chick
episodes.overview: Toni asks Traci to back her as a singer for a show in Indiana, and also asks Tamar to teach Traci the choreography, but the lesson takes a bad turn when Traci walks off the stage; and Trina meets Evelyn's new boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Graduate
episodes.overview: Trina graduates from business school and receives a surprise from her dad and also throws a party to celebrate; and Toni and Tamar fight when Toni announces that she's firing her manager.

episodes.name: The Family Unites
episodes.overview: Toni has surgery; Andre writes a book; Tamar heads into the studio for the recording of her album Love and War.

episodes.name: Family Feuding
episodes.overview: Trina and Gabe agree it’s time for Towanda and Andre to move out of their house, but disagree on how and when to tell her. With Evelyn on a break from seeing Doc, Towanda informs her mother that she’s fixing her up on a blind date.  Evelyn reluctantly agrees to go.

episodes.name: NYC or Bust
episodes.overview: Tamar tells her sisters how stressed she is about their upcoming gig in New York City. They haven’t sung together in a while and have little time to prepare. Terrence, the girls’ vocal coach, runs scales with the girls until Tamar interrupts, saying they don’t have time for Traci being unprepared. Terrence suggests they remove all the bad energy which offends Tamar.

episodes.name: Like Husband, Like Wife
episodes.overview: Tamar gathers the girls to ask if they want to record a song without Toni. Traci says she’s been down this road before and isn’t ready to give up her cosmetology career to pursue the family album. Towanda assures her they’ll still be able to pursue their own passions.

episodes.name: Sisters at War
episodes.overview: Over lunch, Toni tells her sisters that she’s being inducted into the Georgia Music Hall of Fame. Toni asks her sisters to sing at the ceremony as a tribute to her. They are flattered and agree to do it, but worry they’ll have trouble working together without fighting.

episodes.name: Desert Divas
episodes.overview: True feelings are revealed during a therapy session; Toni opines that Traci needs to lose weight, and she tells her sisters that she is through carrying them.

episodes.name: Rocky Relationships
episodes.overview: Tamar and Vince clash during a trip to Chicago; Towanda shows off her new place, but her mood is dampened by a request from Andre; and Trina's husband suggests marriage counseling.

episodes.name: Critical Condition
episodes.overview: Traci explains how she embraced Toni’s advice to lose some weight, and how seeing Vince’s scary situation was even more motivation.

episodes.name: Stir Crazy
episodes.overview: Mamma Braxton gives her reason as to why Vince pulled through such a rough medical state, and why her family is always there for one another.

episodes.name: Soul-O Act
episodes.overview: The family gathers to be with Tamar, who’s stressed about Vince’s recovery. Evelyn asks what’s going on with the Soul Train Awards and Tamar reveals she was asked to sing a Gladys Knight song. Her sisters are surprised. Trina, Towanda and Traci are going to present with Tamar, but they had no idea Tamar was also asked to sing.

episodes.name: Bridezilla
episodes.overview: All the sisters go shopping for Evelyn’s wedding dress in Atlanta. They all have opinions but are frustrated because Evelyn is being indecisive. Toni returns to L.A. while everyone else visits the Botanical Gardens as a possible wedding venue. They discuss music, but Evelyn’s not sure what she wants.

episodes.name: Wedding Daze
episodes.overview: Momma E is so stressed from the wedding plans that she’s driving her daughters crazy!

episodes.name: A Clean Break
episodes.overview: Evelyn calls off the wedding; Toni tells Tamar that she has parted ways with Vince; Gabe tries to make amends by confessing his transgressions against Trina to the family at dinner.

episodes.name: We Got You
episodes.overview: Trina copes with leaving Gabe, and performs original material in front of her sisters for the first time; Tamar speaks with a fertility doctor; and the family appears on "Dr. Phil" to vent their issues.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The reunion show, hosted by Wendy Williams, features the girls, Evelyn and Dr. Sherry. Toni discusses her work, Trina and Towanda explain their complicated marriages and Tamar comments on everything.

episodes.name: Baby Business & Background Singers
episodes.overview: Tamar starts fertility treatments. Tamar and Towanda tell their husbands about the surrogacy idea. Toni enlists her sisters’ help to find new background singers. Evelyn opens a life coaching business.

episodes.name: Sock It to 'Em
episodes.overview: Trina calls a truce with Gabe for the kids and drops her band to focus on her solo career. Toni models for Autism cause at Fashion Week; Tamar and Vince meet potential surrogates to carry their baby.

episodes.name: Great Eggspectations
episodes.overview: Evelyn sets Towanda up on a blind date while Trina starts production on her first music video and asks Gabe to invest. Tamar nervously gets her eggs harvested, fertilized and frozen.

episodes.name: Birthday Party or Go Home
episodes.overview: Trina hustles to get ready for her music video shoot. Traci brushes up on her vocals, and sisters throw her a surprise birthday party. The girls worry about Evelyn and stage a diabetes intervention.

episodes.name: Making the Cut
episodes.overview: Toni asks sisters to perform with her in St. Lucia while Gabe gets a makeover from Evelyn to prove to Trina he’s a changed man. Trina screens her music video for her biggest critics Tamar and Toni.

episodes.name: For Better or Worse
episodes.overview: The Braxtons go on vacation in St. Lucia where Toni performs on stage with her sisters. Trina surprises the family with an impromptu vow renewal ceremony, much to the disapproval of her sisters.

episodes.name: Ciao, Braxtons!
episodes.overview: Toni takes her sisters on a trip to Italy. Tamar can’t join because she’s promoting her single in NYC. Toni realizes there’s tension between Tamar and the other sisters. She confronts Tamar, and tempers erupt.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Braxton Drama!
episodes.overview: Toni receives a visit from her sisters while shooting a film in Canada. The girls go sightseeing and try to bond, but Tamar storms off after getting into a fight with Towanda.

episodes.name: The Tamar-vention
episodes.overview: An emergency therapy session is called so that the sisters can hash out their issues. Also: Toni performs at a gala honoring Barry Manilow; and Tamar, still busy promoting her new single, shoots a music video.

episodes.name: Papa Knows Best
episodes.overview: Michael Braxton attempts to reunite his daughters. Tamar is tired of feeling attacked by her sisters; Toni makes new demands and Traci is getting ready to bolt.

episodes.name: Traci’s Bustin’ Out!
episodes.overview: Trina asks her sisters to be involved in the opening of her new store in Atlanta, but inadvertently stirs up drama by not including her mom. Meanwhile, Traci is nervous about delivering a speech in front of a large crowd; and Toni considers giving up her music career.

episodes.name: Party in the DMV
episodes.overview: The sisters tangle with relatives at dad’s birthday party, then rush to Atlanta when mom Evelyn is hospitalized. Toni meets with Babyface.

episodes.name: A Diva's Dilemma
episodes.overview: Trina angers her sisters by changing plans for the store she's opening; Tamar offers Evelyn some tips on how to attract a man; and a charity event is marked by embarrassment.

episodes.name: What’s Cookin’ In The Oven?
episodes.overview: Trina contemplates a big move, and the sisters get caught up competing against each other in an intense cook-off. Tamar exposes a surprise in the oven.

episodes.name: Hello Baby, Goodbye Dog
episodes.overview: Tamar goes for her first ultrasound, while Evelyn holds a funeral for a beloved family member. Also, Traci has a surprise for the family and Evelyn makes a shocking announcement.

episodes.name: Sister Act
episodes.overview: Toni asks Trina to perform her songs at a concert, but Trina struggles during rehearsals. Evelyn moves to LA and makes Tamar take a parenting class.

episodes.name: Go Hard Or Go Home!
episodes.overview: Trina and Traci have major solo gigs, but Tamar and Toni have harsh criticism for Trina. Towanda sets up Tamar with a new assistant.

episodes.name: Braxton Leading Lady
episodes.overview: Evelyn is ready to take the next step in her love life and dips into the dating pool. Trina makes a business decision that gets a dramatic response.

episodes.name: Rumor Has It
episodes.overview: Toni makes a decision about going back in to the studio, while a big announcement from Toni disrupts Tamar’s shower. Traci’s bizarre behavior leads to shocking news.

episodes.name: A Very Public Affair
episodes.overview: Traci and Trina face questions about their marriages at the Essence Festival. Toni works on her single with Babyface. Tamar promotes her new album.

episodes.name: I Don't Have No Baby
episodes.overview: Traci questions her husband and confronts her sisters; Toni and Tamar prepare for tours.

episodes.name: Back to Braxton Business
episodes.overview: Toni preps to go on her first tour in five years; Tamar struggles through sickness.

episodes.name: Tour De Divas
episodes.overview: Toni is nervous to return to the stage; Trina struggles to redeem herself after a performance falls flat; Tamar shoots a lavish music video.

episodes.name: Birthday-Zilla
episodes.overview: The sisters return home after touring with Toni; Towanda's 40th birthday brings out her demanding side; Trina collaborates with Gabe on a new business venture.

episodes.name: Birthday Bare-All
episodes.overview: Toni and Babyface rehearse for their tour. Towanda poses nude for her 40th birthday, plans mega party, and confronts Trina about the bar company with Gabe. Tamar walks out of the rehearsal for party and faces a major blowup with Towanda.

episodes.name: #Wack #Family
episodes.overview: After months of tension, Tamar and Towanda finally go head-to-head. Toni tries to mediate, but Tamar has to leave to perform on Arsenio. Toni gets hurt on the “Hurt You” video shoot. Traci meets fans in Compton.

episodes.name: They Threw a Shoe at You?
episodes.overview: Tamar and Towanda put aside their feud to throw Toni a glamorous birthday dinner; the girls help Evelyn defend herself against a stalker; Toni pushes her sisters in a ballroom dance class; Trina and Towanda explore a sex shop.

episodes.name: Chix in a Row
episodes.overview: Toni sings the national anthem at the Breeders' Cup and works on her biography; Tamar asks her sisters to join her on tour but only Trina shows up; Traci records for her album and gets Gabe's help for the Bar Chix launch party.

episodes.name: Shade Anonymous
episodes.overview: Trina joins Tamar on the road; Toni & Babyface speak about their careers; Traci and Toni get pulled over by cops.

episodes.name: Who Wants to Be a Braxton?
episodes.overview: Sisters go on a game show; Evelyn is arrested; Tamar does a meet and greet at a radio station.

episodes.name: Award Show Shade!
episodes.overview: Tamar is honored at the Soul Train Awards; Trina's back in the studio; Trina tries to reunite Towanda and Tamar.

episodes.name: It’s All Good!
episodes.overview: Tamar attends the Grammys; Vince throws an after-party using Trina's Bar Chix service; Towanda and Evelyn have a heart-to-heart talk; a birthday is celebrated; a surprise christening.

episodes.name: Bright Lights, Big Breakdowns
episodes.overview: The girls are in NYC for Toni’s Broadway show but tension flares up at Tamar’s birthday party when a guest offends the sisters and Tamar defends him. Towanda erupts into a shocking meltdown at the dinner table!

episodes.name: Sisters on the Verge
episodes.overview: After an explosive family dinner, the sisters go on a therapy retreat. Traci accuses Tamar’s assistant of grabbing her, but Tamar blows up and insists Traci attacked her first. Towanda makes a leap of faith.

episodes.name: Jamaican Me Crazy
episodes.overview: After all the drama, Evelyn insists the sisters go to Jamaica to have some fun. Toni performs; the girls parasail and party. But at the end of the trip, they’re still unsure about the fate of the family album.

episodes.name: I Ain't Scared of No Demons
episodes.overview: Trina, Towanda and Traci move to LA to start the Braxton album, but Toni and Tamar disagree over how to produce the project. Tamar works on her tour. Traci and Kevin continue their Marriage Bootcamp therapy.

episodes.name: Starting Off On a Bad Note
episodes.overview: The sisters start work on the album but clash about the details; Evelyn has a piano delivered for inspiration; Tamar gets the take-over spirit and searches for dancers.

episodes.name: Dares & Distractions
episodes.overview: Sisters have surprise visits from brother Michael and Trina's husband Gabe.; tensions rise as the girls struggle to make progress on their album; a pajama party gets out of control; Tamar and Trina have a blowup.

episodes.name: A Single Decision
episodes.overview: The sisters reconsider the album and decide to do a single; Trina clashes with Traci and Towanda; Tamar preps for her tour.

episodes.name: Booked to Capacity
episodes.overview: Toni reveals shocking info in her memoir. Traci struggles with a photo shoot. While Tamar preps for her tour, the sisters plan a risky surprise.

episodes.name: Surprise Me Not
episodes.overview: Towanda, Traci & Trina surprise Tamar on stage. Tamar is thrown off-guard, and the surprise completely backfires. Toni and Dr. Sherry try to help the girls work it out, but they only end up fighting more.

episodes.name: A Split Decision
episodes.overview: The sisters meet to work out issues after Tamar’s Atlanta show, but drama escalates. Traci’s music video; a Braxton is rushed to the hospital; and Tamar considers a drastic decision about the sisterhood.

episodes.name: Go For the Jugular!
episodes.overview: The sisters still have unresolved issues, but they reunite after finding out their mom needs surgery. Trina secretly files for divorce but doesn’t want to tell the sisters. Traci’s son reveals he’s engaged!

episodes.name: Ms. E-mergency
episodes.overview: Sisters are stressed when Mama Evelyn faces major surgery, and Tamar panics when she can’t be there. After Trina’s court appearance, the family is fearful when she reveals shocking details of the divorce.

episodes.name: No Time to Panic!
episodes.overview: Traci has a rough rehearsal before an important show; Trina discovers that Gabe has sunk to a new low by not paying their bills; and Tamar feels left out of the family loop.

episodes.name: Forty, Free and on Fleek!
episodes.overview: Traci panics before her showcase; Toni gets an award; Trina brings a mystery date to her 40th birthday party.

episodes.name: Taste For Chocolate...
episodes.overview: Trina looks forward to resolving some issues with Tamar; and goes on a first date with someone she discovers doesn't drink alcohol. Toni calls Traci out for drinking too much alcohol; and receives support from her sisters on the night of the Grammys.

episodes.name: Sisters Strike Out
episodes.overview: The Braxton sisters bond; and Toni prepares for a show, while Traci seems to be enjoying herself a little too much, which threatens to get her in big trouble with her big sis.

episodes.name: Queens of the Everglades
episodes.overview: Towanda gets her sisters to agree to go on an adventure tour through the Everglades; efforts to get Trina to open up prove unsuccessful; and Toni invites Tracy to her hotel room for a chat.

episodes.name: Divine Intervention
episodes.overview: After Tamar misses an important family event, she defends herself to the sisters. A major blowup splits the family. Parents insist on a counseling session with well-known spiritual advisor Bishop T.D. Jakes.

episodes.name: One Wild Ride
episodes.overview: Bishop T.D. Jakes gives harsh criticism to the sisters. Daddy surprises everyone with an RV trip to an amusement park. Trina stresses over her next court date for her divorce and gets ready for a major fight.

episodes.name: In the Hot Seat
episodes.overview: Trina faces final divorce decisions and stresses over Bar Chix. The sisters grill Trina’s new man Jacent. Tamar gets feedback from the sisters on her single. Traci’s pushed to finally deal with her issues.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.overview: Traci confronts the sisters. Tamar promotes her spring fashion line in NYC. Trina recruits bartenders. Toni invites Traci to sing during her show at a major jazz festival. Traci is overwhelmed at soundcheck.

episodes.name: It's a Family Thing
episodes.overview: Traci performs at Toni’s show; all the sisters are there. Trina’s new man meets Daddy. Traci confronts her son and his fiancée. Trina’s search for bartenders. Tamar throws a party for Logan’s second birthday.

episodes.name: The Feud!
episodes.overview: The sisters get competitive on Family Feud. Tamar shocks Evelyn with her new video. Traci forces Kevin Jr. and fiancée to care for a fake baby. Trina goes barhopping with potential Bar Chix; things get wild.

episodes.name: Restraint Thineself
episodes.overview: Tamar is concerned that Trina’s boyfriend wants a private meeting with their father. Towanda shocks all with her role in a new theater project. Sisters attend Trina’s test run for Bar Chix; bartender blows up.

episodes.name: An Engaging Question
episodes.overview: Trina's relationship takes a major turn as she deals with another stressful delay with Bar Chix; Tamar has an ambitious photo shoot for her new release, but the wardrobe is all wrong; and Toni proposes recording a Christmas album with her sisters.

episodes.name: Making Fetch Happen
episodes.overview: Trina finds out what’s inside secret box from Jacent. Towanda and Trina have news for Toni. Sisters start to work on Toni’s Christmas album, but busy schedules and past issues stir up drama.

episodes.name: Not My Momma!
episodes.overview: Evelyn suffers from a stroke, which turns into an East Coast vs. West Coast sister battle over Mommy! Evelyn’s near death experience sparks a new lease on life while Traci faces a health scare of her own.

episodes.name: Man Enough For Mommy
episodes.overview: Trina hires a matchmaker for Mommy in Atlanta. Toni craves new experiences and takes the plunge. Tamar wants the Hollywood Medium, Tyler Henry to connect with angels, but Trina is not on board & tension rises.

episodes.name: S*** Gets Real
episodes.overview: Tamar opens up about being fired from "The Real"; Trina suspects she has a stalker.

episodes.name: Not Famous Enough
episodes.overview: Towanda spills the tea about Trina’s man. Traci worries about her surgery. Tamar gets upset when Towanda goes missing at her fashion show. Daddy issues arise for Tamar & Trina.

episodes.name: Oh You Tried It!
episodes.overview: Toni screens her biopic movie; Tamar meets her on-screen counterpart; and Towanda confesses her secret to Trina. Later, Trina finally deals with her sister issues.

episodes.name: You Gotta Get Pelvic to Pelvic!
episodes.overview: Toni performs in Brooklyn; dinner disaster. Tamar critiques Towanda before her dance competition. Toni tells Tamar her plans to retire her sisters.

episodes.name: Toni Got A Ditty!
episodes.overview: Tamar is uber-anxious when she performs for Smokey Robinson. Toni reveals she has a date. Towanda’s secret appointment; sisters are shocked. Trina confronts her sisters.

episodes.name: You Want That Old Thang Back?
episodes.overview: Trina reveals that she contacted her ex, Gabe, much to Tamar's dismay. Later, Toni gets competitive at a cook-off between the sisters; and Towanda feels challenged during acting class.

episodes.name: Wasband's Back
episodes.overview: Trina has a candid conversation with her ex that turns sour when past infidelities are brought up. Later, Toni's final show with Trina and Towanda performing as her backup singers is an emotional event for everyone involved.

episodes.name: What's the T With You and B?
episodes.overview: Toni surprises her sisters with an unexpected visitor to celebrate their final performance; Toni invites a man to dinner; and Tamar insists on coaching Evelyn for her runway debut. Later, Gabe has a proposal for Trina.

episodes.name: This Is Not About ReKindlerization...or Is It?
episodes.overview: Trina continues to move forward with Gabe; Tamar's photo shoot; Traci records a new, sexy album but her manager has doubts.

episodes.name: Trick Thy Sister
episodes.overview: Gabe makes a shocking confession to Trina. Later, Tamar performs at an exclusive event; Traci tricks her sisters at her studio session; and Toni's dinner is ruined after Tamar's insulted.

episodes.name: Flippin' The Bird
episodes.overview: Tamar's shocked by her sisters' reaction to her surprise. Later, Trina worries Towanda's new home could signify a big move; and Trina enlists a hypnotist to help conquer her fear.

episodes.name: Broadway or Bust
episodes.overview: Trina's sons have a showdown with her ex, Gabe. Later, Tamar informs the producers that her sisters aren't interested in doing a Broadway show; and Towanda performs for an agent.

episodes.name: Spilling The Tea
episodes.overview: Tensions rise during a sister slumber party at Toni's house; a trip down memory lane opens old wounds; Tamar storms out.

episodes.name: Tabloids, Rumors, and Repercussions
episodes.overview: Tamar faces shocking tabloid rumors about her marriage. Towanda finally files for divorce. Toni gets grilled about her new romance. Traci confronts Tamar about her posts on social media.

episodes.name: You Run Your Mouth, I'll Run My Business
episodes.overview: Towanda's divorce battle continues & it's war! A sudden glitch injures Toni right before she's about to perform. A taste test quickly turns south when Tamar and Trina get heated over Bar Chix!

episodes.name: The Mother of All Insults
episodes.overview: The sisters' blowout fight leads to the mother of all insults. Tamar reveals a shocking secret she's kept from her sisters. Trina scouts for her pop up Bar Chix location.

episodes.name: Bird On The Brain
episodes.overview: Tamar finally tells her parents her secret, stunning Miss Evelyn. Tamar grills Toni about her new beau. Birdman meets Daddy at a family dinner. Tamar proposes a shocking invitation to her sisters.

episodes.name: Back In The Hot Seat
episodes.overview: The sisters fear old wounds will be exposed on Bishop T.D. Jakes' talk show and a last-minute performance throws them off. A blended family proposal shocks all when Daddy suggests his wife attends a family trip.

episodes.name: Pop Up, Pop Off
episodes.overview: When the sisters hear concerning rumors before Trina's Pop Up Bar Chix event, they confront Trina. Trina reveals the truth about a shocking arrest at her home. Tempers flare in Towanda's custody battle.

episodes.name: Opposing Counsel
episodes.overview: Tamar's new single sparks drama when Mommy is shocked to find out it's written about her and Daddy's divorce. The gloves come off in Towanda's custody battle. Traci does a photoshoot for her whiskey line.

episodes.name: Donde Esta Daddy?
episodes.overview: The Braxtons arrive in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico for their family trip-but where's Daddy? While the sisters are having fun, surprise guests threaten to ruin the vacation.

episodes.name: The Other Mrs. Braxton
episodes.overview: Daddy brings his wife to Mexico, stunning Miss Evelyn and the girls. All hell breaks loose when Toni invites Daddy and his wife to dinner. After years of misconceptions, the girls learn the shocking truth!

episodes.name: After the Storm
episodes.overview: The sisters try to move forward after their dramatic dinner with Daddy. Tamar tries to clear the air with Daddy, but isn't ready to invite his wife to Vince's birthday party. The sisters also bail on the party.

episodes.name: There's Something About Mommy
episodes.overview: In the Season 5 finale, Toni discovers a scary new Lupus symptom that could change her life forever. Later, Towanda reveals news about her divorce; and Evelyn finally opens up about the ladies' father and the Mexico trip.

episodes.name: The Duchess & the Divorce
episodes.overview: The Braxtons are stunned by news of Tamar's divorce filing. Traci reveals her shocking secret. The sisters finally confront Tamar about her divorce and when past issues resurface, Tamar storms out!

episodes.name: Allegedly
episodes.overview: Toni’s back in the studio with beau, Birdman. When Miss Evelyn speaks to the press about Tamar’s volatile relationship with Vince, Tamar goes into hiding. Trina & Traci’s epic party bus to Vegas is a fail when an unexpected visitor arrives.

episodes.name: Living Legend
episodes.overview: With Tamar in hiding, will she miss Toni’s 50th birthday? Toni’s stunned by a shocking party foul. Traci pressures her son over baby news. Tamar performs and Toni receives the Soul Train Legend Award.

episodes.name: Law & Order
episodes.overview: Towanda’s decision to take legal action could tear the Braxton Family apart. Toni’s shocking announcement. Towanda’s ex blasts her on social media. Traci fears son Kevin is not ready to be a dad & puts him in baby bootcamp.

episodes.name: Don't Rock the Boat
episodes.overview: Toni shoots her new music video. Traci gets snubbed by Tamar on her movie set & when the sisters find out, they’re taken aback. The sisters have bad news for Toni. Trina’s pricey new buy. Tamar helps plan Mommy’s birthday, but will she show up?

episodes.name: Braxtons Under Fire
episodes.overview: The sisters are stunned when an unexpected guest shows up at Mommy’s birthday party. Toni invites the girls on the set of her movie & they’re shocked by her transformation. Traci reveals the gender of her grandbaby.

episodes.name: Plus One, Plus Drama
episodes.overview: Toni finally shares she’s engaged with the sisters, but it quickly escalates into sibling rivalry over who’s planning the wedding. Traci starts to plan her son’s baby shower, but fears the worst when her father asks for an invitation for his wife!

episodes.name: Shattered Dreams
episodes.overview: Tamar & Towanda take over Toni’s wedding planning; Traci celebrates her son’s baby shower, but her joy is cut short when she receives devastating news about her upcoming tour with her sisters and fears they are to blame.

episodes.name: Toni-zilla
episodes.overview: Toni’s wedding is in jeopardy. The sisters confront Traci about facing her unresolved issues. A family rift turns into an avalanche of emotions. The Braxtons shock all with a dramatic turn of events.

episodes.name: Sister Shutdown
episodes.overview: Family tension rises; Toni demands an apology. The Braxton sisters shock all by refusing to show to up work. All communication is stopped & production is forced to shut down. The future of Braxton Family Values is in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Traci vs. Sisters
episodes.overview: Sisters’ shocking walk out changes everything! Traci makes a difficult decision. Talks with the Braxtons about returning to the show reaches a pivotal moment. Celebrity friends rally around Traci.

episodes.name: Wellness Hell
episodes.overview: Celebrity friends including Phaedra Parks, Luenell, and Natalie Nunn join Traci for an outrageous wellness retreat. Traci is pressed for Braxton’s gossip. A drastic turn of events concerning the sisters changes everything!

episodes.name: Duchess & the Dude Ranch
episodes.overview: Toni faces Traci about the divided sisterhood. Towanda speaks out. Traci escapes family drama at a dude ranch where she is joined by outrageous reality stars. In a crazy turn of events, Flavor Flav and New York reunite to turn the rodeo upside down.

episodes.name: Not Today Satan
episodes.overview: Toni is shocked when Trina & Towanda reveal the truth about Traci’s role in the strike. Tamar speaks out on family drama; Towanda hatches a plan to heal the sisterhood. Traci returns from the cattle drive & must perform amidst tense sister drama.

episodes.name: Hot Bed of Crazy
episodes.overview: After years of broken communication, the Braxtons begin explosive family therapy with Iyanla Vanzant to heal the fractured sisterhood. But when things take an unexpected turn, Iyanla calls them out and it leads to a shocking exit!

episodes.name: Truth & Consequences
episodes.overview: The Braxtons reveal shocking and surprising confessions to Iyanla Vanzant to heal the broken sisterhood -- including one sister's admission she doesn't like her sisters and another's tearful apology; when pushed too far, Tamar storms off.

episodes.name: A New Beginning?
episodes.overview: After an emotional family healing retreat, the Braxtons work to repair their fractured sisterhood; Tamar presses Toni for answers about Birdman; Tamar finds new love and is on the road with Snoop; the sisters reunite, but Toni storms out.

episodes.name: Tamar's Mystery Man
episodes.overview: Tamar's celebratory dinner is interrupted when Toni reveals the truth about why she stormed out; Tamar reveals her mystery man; Toni is crowned a Lady; Trina meets Von's mom, but is grilled about her past.

episodes.name: Sister Secrets
episodes.overview: Tamar embarks on a secret spy mission to uncover her sisters’ secrets. After mounting tension, Traci & Tamar team up to plan Trina’s birthday. A family celebration takes a shocking turn when devastating news rocks the sisterhood.

episodes.name: Touring Us Apart
episodes.overview: Toni consoles Trina after news of Gabe’s illness and Trina is shocked by Toni’s confession about Birdman. Traci joins Tamar’s tour & they try to put their past differences aside but a backstage fight erupts & threatens the sisters’ new bond.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: Tamar reveals big news. Toni makes headlines with shocking Birdman breakup rumors. Tamar & Traci meet face-to-face for the first time since their tour drama. A devastating tragedy strikes the sisterhood.

episodes.name: Off Again, On Again?
episodes.overview: Toni asks Trina and Towanda to perform with her unexpectedly, but Birdman shocks all and surprises Toni onstage; Tamar's new boo is interrogated by the sisters; the Braxtons are stunned by Tamar's "Celebrity Big Brother" breakdown.

episodes.name: Grammys & Gossip
episodes.overview: Birdman and Traci's blowup sparks drama at Toni's Grammy dinner; Tamar celebrates a big win on "Celebrity Big Brother" but issues resurface when Traci goes MIA at her after-party; Von drops a bombshell on Ms. E.

episodes.name: Secrets & Rumors
episodes.overview: Tamar is on a whirlwind tour after her "Celebrity Big Brother" win, but David's shocking news turns everything upside down; Towanda keeps a secret; Von and Trina's relationship comes to a major crossroads; a pregnancy rumor rocks the sisterhood.

episodes.name: Whine Country
episodes.overview: New boyfriends spark drama in California's Napa Valley when a shocking story reveals David's true colors; a pregnancy rumor raises sister suspicion; tension builds between the couples; Tamar feels slighted, and her birthday dinner takes a left turn.

episodes.name: Engaged & Enraged
episodes.overview: Tensions reach an all-time high during the trip to California's Napa Valley; Trina's surprise engagement enrages Tamar; Traci reaches her breaking point when the boyfriends suggest an intervention and she explodes at the cameras in an epic meltdown.

episodes.name: Bachelorette Braxton Style
episodes.overview: Singer and songwriter Toni Braxton and her four sisters reveal strong sisterly bonds.

episodes.name: A Stumble to the Altar
episodes.overview: Tamar does a bachelorette do-over; Trina's big day plans are in jeopardy; Toni tries to cure her sister's wedding blues; Traci falls.

episodes.name: Third Times a Charm
episodes.overview: Trina has a fairy-tale wedding but Traci leaves abruptly; Traci speaks to a professional about why she felt uncomfortable and gets help re-setting her boundaries; the pandemic hits everyone but the family comes back together before a big scare.

episodes.name: Love After Lockdown
episodes.overview: Toni’s tour is canceled; Trina and Von get new roommates; Towanda and Sean discuss their future; Traci and Kevin work through the pandemic; Traci sets new boundaries, and Towanda tests those boundries when she shows up.

episodes.name: Life Goes On
episodes.overview: Toni will not let the virus interfere with the roll out of her new singles; Traci figures out if her boundaries will allow her to take a sister trip to Los Angeles; Sean is visiting Mr. Braxton to get his blessing.

episodes.name: Sister Staycation
episodes.overview: Toni’s latest single drops just in time for her birthday; the sisters and Ms. E are quarantining with surprises at the house; Towanda takes care of the last hurdle preventing Sean from popping the question.
